metadata.name: L. Messi - Common 1/700
metadata.description:
Ethereum Football Stars Club (EFS) is a blockchain-based platform for football fans and collectors. Through EFS, users can collect digital player cards featuring their favorite football stars and earn tokens based on real-life performances. 
Each player in EFS has a limited edition of 1001 cards available for collectors, including 700 Common, 250 Epic, 50 Gold, and 1 Unique card. One of the most sought-after cards in EFS is the Ronaldo Gold Card, with only 50 cards available. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own a piece of football history with EFS.
